name: THE ROADHOG FROG
description:
Avoid the bees while jumping to score points by collecting flies!

THE ROADHOG FROG was created as a submission for the olc::BeatTheBoredom Jam. This Nintendo Game Boy game was completed over the course of 16 days and was written entirely in GBZ80 assembly. It will run on a Game Boy emulator as well as the original hardware.
